Replace.Text: [COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_KUBLAIKHAN_VIETNAM_MOD_DESCRIPTION]Contains a new civilization, two new leaders, a new district, two new buildings, and the Monopolies and Corporations game mode.
[COLOR_RED]TRANSLATION MISSING[ENDCOLOR][LOC_KUBLAIKHAN_VIETNAM_MOD_TEASER]New Civilization and Leaders - Vietnam, and Kublai Khan, an alternate leader for China and Mongolia
